name: KATANA MASTER
description:
KATANA MASTER - a world full of dangers and trials. You are a brave hero. Arm yourself with your beloved sword and save the humanity from evil monsters! Armed with a sword, you have to go through an infinite number of randomly created levels.

Get coins, spend them on chests, opening which you will receive a sword with random strength, shape, color, enchantment!

Key Features:
Random levels that differ from each other.
A variety of enemies.
A huge number of randomly created swords.
